00001 /**\file n_exceptions.c
00002  * ExceptionContextList management for C
00003  *\author Castagnier Mickael

00005  *\date 20/11/09
00006  *
00007  */
00008  
00009 #include <pthread.h>
00010 #include "nilorea/n_common.h"
00011 #include "nilorea/n_log.h"
00012 #include "nilorea/n_exceptions.h"
00013 
00014 
00015 ExceptionContextList* __Exceptions = NULL;
00016                                                                 
00017 
00018 
00019 /*!\fn void push_exception()
00020  *\brief Function to push an exception in the list
00021  */
00022 void push_exception(void)
00023 {
00024    ExceptionContextList *_new = ( ExceptionContextList * )malloc( sizeof( ExceptionContextList ) );
00025 
00026    if( _new )
00027    {
00028       _new->head = __Exceptions;
00029       __Exceptions = _new;
00030    }
00031    else
00032    {
00033       n_log( LOG_ERR , "Cannot even add a new exception context !!" );
00034    }
00035 } /* push_exception() */
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039 /*!\fn void pop_exception( int ex )
00040  *\brief Function to pop an exception in the list
00041  *\param ex Type of exception to pop
00042  */
00043 void pop_exception( int ex )
00044 {
00045    ExceptionContextList *head = NULL ;
00046    head = __Exceptions -> head;
00047    Free( __Exceptions );
00048    __Exceptions = head;
00049 
00050    if( ex != NO_EXCEPTION ) 
00051    {
00052       if( __Exceptions )
00053       {
00054          longjmp( __Exceptions -> context , ex );
00055       }
00056    }
00057 } /* pop_exception */
